name: BotHeads
description:
Guide your little flying robots through a beautiful handcrafted world filled with things to fly past, bounce off or dash through!

BotHeads is an atmospheric arcade adventure game by the creators of Hanger & Hanger World. "It's like an amazing dream where Sonic The Hedgehog, transformed into a flying robot, is trapped in badlands filled with weird monsters and cats with laser eyes."

BotHeads just wanna fly fast.
Maybe do some loops and bounce off a spring.
Spin around to a great song and rack up some points!

Oh – and it features a brand new soundtrack by Boy vs Bacteria.

FEATURES
• Handcrafted world with amazing physics
• Game Center Highscores
• Haptic feedback on supported devices
• Soundtrack by Boy vs Bacteria
• Warp Zones that lets you skip levels
• Cats with laser eyes
• Support for iPhone X

REVIEWS
"Here’s a game that you should be playing right now!"
• Snappzilla.com

"Thanks to a slick control system, this is one game that definitely deserves a second look."
8/10 • PocketGamer.co.uk

"If you enjoy playing platformer style games that don’t feature a random stage that regenerates itself each time you GAME OVER, this is probably the highest quality game currently available."
